main_endkey: Press the ~y~{EndCall]~w~ key to end the current callout.
main_interkey: Press ~y~{Dialog}~w~ to talk to the suspect
b3: Try not to dream about traffic stops.
b4: Los Santos can survive without you… maybe.
b9: Stay out of trouble... for once.
steak_out_park_dispatch: ~b~Dispatch:~w~ Park your vehicle and observe the area for suspicious activity.
steak_out_player: Park nearby and stay in your vehicle.
steak_out_activity: ~o~Suspicious activity detected! A suspect is fleeing the scene.
wlfc_sub1: ~y~Suspect: ~w~Hi there Officer, how may I help you? Am I in any trouble? (1/5)
wlfc_sub2: ~b~You: ~w~Hi. No no, you're not in any trouble. I'm just checking in on this address, as we've had a welfare check request come through. Apparently you hadn't answered your phone today and someone is concerned. Are you ok? (2/5)
wlfc_sub3: ~y~Suspect: ~w~Oh nooo! I didn't mean to worry anyone. (3/5)
wlfc_sub4_1: ~y~Suspect: ~w~I lost my phone on the bus today, I was actually just about to walk to the payphone down the road, to ring the bus depot to ask if it was handed in. (4/5)
wlfc_sub4_2: ~y~Suspect: ~w~ Sorry my phone battery died. I forgot to charge it earlier! I noticed a missed call but, didn't think anything of it. (4/5)
wlfc_sub4_3: ~y~Suspect: ~w~Let me check... Ohhh, My phone is on silent, haha! I'll call them back now. Sorry to cause such an inconvenience! (4/5)
wlfc_sub5_1: ~b~You: ~w~Ouch. I'll let dispatch know that everything is algood here. Hopefully someone handed it in, at the bus depot! (5/5)
wlfc_sub5_2: ~b~You: ~w~Alright, well as long as everything here is okay, I can leave you alone. You should return the missed call, the caller was really worried about you. (5/5)
wlfc_sub5_3: ~b~You: ~w~No worries, I'm just glad that you're okay. I'll let dispatch know that everything is algood here. (5/5)
wlfc_complete: ~b~Dispatch: ~w~The welfare check is complete. You can continue roleplaying this callout if you wish, but it has officially ended.
wlfc_calladv: A Call came through asking to check on their Friend. Hasn't Answered their phone all day. Respond ~y~CODE-2~c~.
wlfc_callamb: We are going to call an ~y~ambulance~w~ to your current location, officer.
wlfc_investigate: Investigate the area. If you don't find anyone here, then ~g~End~w~ the callout.
wlfc_noti1: ~b~Dispatch:~w~ Someone called the police for a welfare check. Search the ~y~yellow area~w~ for the person. Respond with ~y~Code 2
csrb_calladv: A Conveinince Store has had A Silent Alarm tripped. Respond ~y~CODE-3~c~.
csrb_sub2: ~r~ SUSPECT: ~w~DAYUM THE FIVE-0 IS HERE, RUNNNN
dga_calladv: ~c~A WILD animal has been spotted. Go and Investigate the Scene.
dga_1: ~c~A Wild Animal has been spotted. Respond ~y~CODE-2~c~ and Determine if its dangerous.
dga_2: ~c~Reports have come in, stating that it's a Mountain Lion. Procced with ~o~Caution~c.~
dga_hlp1: Investigate and Determine whether the Mountain Lion, is danerous or not.
dga_sub1: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Hiii there buddy, are you friendly?
dga_hlp3: If you can, call for animal control. Otherwise Press '~y~'I'~w~' and 'COUNTY Animal Control' will come for the animal. Just remember to self ~y~END ~w~Call when finished.
dga_anctrl: ~c~County Animal Control is on the way. The call will ~y~END ~w~ now
dbf_calladv: ~c~A Dead Body has been found. Respond ~y~CODE-3~c~ And investigate the scene
mg_spot: ~c~A Mugging has been spotted. Respond ~r~CODE-3~c~ to the ~r~-SCENE-
mg_sub1: ~r~SUSPECT: ~w~Dayum the Five-O is here, gotta go.. Stay back PIGS!!!
osr_noti1: ~b~Dispatch:~w~ Reports of an illegal street race in progress.
pwg_callmsg: Person With A Gun In Public
pwg_seen: ~c~A Person with a gun has been seen in public. Respond ~r~CODE-3~c~ to the ~r~-SCENE-
sp_calladv: ~c~There have been reports of suspicious activity. Go and investigate the area. Respond ~y~CODE-2~c~.
sp_hlp1: Investigate the area and question any suspicious person/s.
sp_sub1: ~o~Locate ~w~ the suspect and talk with them
sp_noti1: ~c~ The suspect is on the move, follow search new blipped area.
pd_calladv: ~c~A Witness has reported a Security Gaurd and Civilian arguing. Respond CODE-2 and Sort out Situation.
pd_sub1: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Hey guys, what seems to be the problem here? (1/11)
pd_sub2: ~g~GAURD~w~: Hello offcier, This imbecile was causing a fuss with a few people. I stepped in and tried to calm them down. (2/11)
pd_sub3: ~r~SUSPECT~w~: Nahhh man... Hes full of shit.. I ain't done nothin!! (3/11)
pd_sub4: ~g~GAURD~w~: What do you mean. You were fighting with a couple just over there.. All because they looked over and saw you? (4/11)
pd_sub5: ~r~SUSPECT~w~: Ayyeee... The fucckkkk. Nah bro I ain't do that.. You playin (5/11)
pd_sub6: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Alright everyone needs to calm down. (6/11)
pd_sub7: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Gaurd, do you have any security footage of the incident? (7/11)
pd_sub8: ~g~GAURD~w~: Yeah I do.. Let me see ifff.. Here its on my phone. (8/11)
pd_sub9: ~g~GAURD~w~: ~o~ *SHOWS YOU SECURITY FOOTAGE OF SUSPECT HARRASING A COUPLE. TIMESTAMPED ~w~'10 Minutes Ago'* (9/11)
pd_sub10_2: : As far as the security footage goes. You are guilty (10/11)
pd_sub11: ~r~SUSPECT~w~: Ahhh shitt.... Nahh that must be FAKE!!!! (11/11)
pi_calladv: ~c~An Intoxicated Individual has been spotted. Investigate the scene
pi_noti1_2: Intoxicated in public. Deal with the Intoxicated person
pi_sub3: ~b~Player: ~s~Being intoxicated in public is an Illegal Offense. I'm going to have to write you a citation. (3/4)
pi_sub6: ~h~Detain or Arrest the Suspect at your will.
pi_1_1_1: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Sir, you seem a bit unsteady. Have you been drinking tonight?
~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Sir, you seem a bit unsteady. Have you been drinking tonight?
pi_1_1_2: ~o~Suspect~w~: *hic* Nooope! I'm just... enjoying the fresh air!
pi_1_1_3: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: I can smell alcohol on your breath. How much have you had?
pi_1_1_4: ~o~Suspect~w~: Pfft, just a *hic* couple... maybe a few... or more.
pi_1_1_5: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: I'm going to need to see some ID and run a quick test.
pi_1_1_6: ~o~Suspect~w~: You cops always ruining the fun! Fine!
pi_1_2_1: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Sir, you’re swaying a lot. Are you alright?
pi_1_2_2: ~o~Suspect~w~: Heeey! Officer! You're my *hic* best friend!
pi_1_2_3: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Sir, I need to know if you’ve been drinking.
pi_1_2_4: ~o~Suspect~w~: I only had... *starts counting on fingers* oh whatever, not much!
pi_1_2_5: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: I need you to take a breathalyzer test.
pi_1_3_1: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Sir, please calm down. You're causing a disturbance.
pi_1_3_2: ~o~Suspect~w~: Who do you think you are?! *slurs* I ain't done nothing wrong!
pi_1_3_3: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: I need you to lower your voice and cooperate.
pi_1_3_4: ~o~Suspect~w~: Make me! You think you’re so tough!
pi_1_3_5: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Sir, don’t make this worse for yourself.
pi_1_3_6: ~o~Suspect~w~: Fine! Whatever, just leave me alone!
pi_1_4_1: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Sir, you're being quite loud. What's going on?
pi_1_4_2: ~o~Suspect~w~: Officer! Listen! *sings terribly* Don't stop believin'~!
pi_1_4_3: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Sir, I need you to keep it down.
pi_1_4_4: ~o~Suspect~w~: You don't like my singing? That hurts, man.
pi_1_4_5: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Just step over here and let’s talk.
pi_1_4_6: ~o~Suspect~w~: Alright, alright, but only if you sing with me!
pi_1_5_1: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Sir, you alright? You seem upset.
pi_1_5_3: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: That’s not true. Do you have anyone you can call?
pi_1_5_4: ~o~Suspect~w~: *hic* No one wants to talk to me. I messed up everything!
pi_1_5_5: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: I can call someone for you. Let’s just take a breath and talk.
pi_1_5_6: ~o~Suspect~w~: *sniffs* You’re too nice... Maybe I should just go home...
pi_2_1_1: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Hey, are you okay? You look a little nervous.
pi_2_1_2: ~o~Suspect~w~: Are you... are you watching me? Who sent you?
pi_2_1_3: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: I’m just checking on you. Are you under the influence?
pi_2_1_4: ~o~Suspect~w~: I knew it! You’re in on it! They're after me!
pi_2_1_5: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Sir, I need you to stay calm and talk to me.
pi_2_1_6: ~o~Suspect~w~: I CAN'T GO BACK! *tries to run*
pi_2_2_1: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Sir, you seem really excited. What's going on?
pi_2_2_2: ~o~Suspect~w~: Officer! It's such a great night! The stars are dancing!
pi_2_2_4: ~o~Suspect~w~: Just a little... enhancement! But I feel amazing!
pi_2_2_5: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: I need you to focus and answer my questions seriously.
pi_2_2_6: ~o~Suspect~w~: Okay okay, but have you ever just felt the universe, man?
pi_2_3_1: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Sir, do you know where you are right now?
pi_2_3_2: ~o~Suspect~w~: Uhhh… yeah! I’m... wait… where am I again?
pi_2_3_3: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: You seem really out of it. Have you been using drugs?
pi_2_3_4: ~o~Suspect~w~: No, no! Just... my brain is a little... fuzzy.
pi_2_3_5: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Do you have anything illegal on you?
pi_2_3_6: ~o~Suspect~w~: I don't even know what I have... or who I am…
pi_2_4_2: ~o~Suspect~w~: Shhh! They can hear us! The shadows are moving!
pi_2_4_3: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Who is listening? What are you talking about?
pi_2_4_4: ~o~Suspect~w~: The walls have eyes, man! They're everywhere!
pi_2_4_5: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: I think you need some help. Let’s talk this out.
pi_2_4_6: ~o~Suspect~w~: NO! The ground is melting! I have to go!
pi_2_5_2: ~o~Suspect~w~: Hahaha! Oh, nothing! Just... your face! HAHAHA!
pi_2_5_3: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Are you under the influence of anything?
pi_2_5_4: ~o~Suspect~w~: Influence? Nah, man, I'm just happy! Everything is hilarious!
pi_2_5_5: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: I need you to take this seriously.
pi_2_5_6: ~o~Suspect~w~: Okay, okay... *tries to hold in laughter* PFFT—HAHAHA!
pi_3_1_1: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Sir, are you okay? You seem really out of it.
pi_3_1_2: ~o~Suspect~w~: Whoa... your face is melting, man!
pi_3_1_3: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Have you been drinking or taking anything tonight?
pi_3_1_4: ~o~Suspect~w~: I dunno, but I think the sidewalk is moving...
pi_3_1_5: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: I need you to focus. Look at me.
pi_3_1_6: ~o~Suspect~w~: Wait... are you real? Or just another hallucination?
pi_3_2_1: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Sir, you look nervous. What's going on?
pi_3_2_2: ~o~Suspect~w~: You… you followed me, didn’t you?!
pi_3_2_3: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: I just need to ask you a few questions.
pi_3_2_4: ~o~Suspect~w~: NO! The government’s onto me! I can’t talk!
pi_3_2_5: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Sir, I need you to stay where you are.
pi_3_2_6: ~o~Suspect~w~: I CAN’T! They’ll find me! *tries to run*
pi_3_3_2: ~o~Suspect~w~: Hahahaha! Oh man! Your hat is SO BIG!
pi_3_3_3: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Have you been drinking or using anything?
pi_3_3_4: ~o~Suspect~w~: Hehe... maaaybe... but why are your eyes so tiny?!
pi_3_3_5: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Sir, I need you to take this seriously.
pi_3_3_6: ~o~Suspect~w~: Hahahaha! I can’t! This is the funniest night ever!
pi_3_4_2: ~o~Suspect~w~: I’m GREAT! No, wait… I’m SAD! No, wait… I’m ANGRY!
pi_3_4_3: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: I need you to calm down.
pi_3_4_4: ~o~Suspect~w~: Don’t tell me what to do! I’M A FREE SPIRIT!
pi_3_4_5: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Just relax and talk to me.
pi_3_4_6: ~o~Suspect~w~: I love you, man... but also... I might fight you!
pi_3_5_2: ~o~Suspect~w~: I’m GREAT! No, wait… I’m SAD! No, wait… I’m ANGRY!
pi_3_5_3: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: I need you to calm down.
pi_3_5_4: ~o~Suspect~w~: Don’t tell me what to do! I’M A FREE SPIRIT!
pi_3_5_5: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Just relax and talk to me.
pi_3_5_6: ~o~Suspect~w~: I love you, man... but also... I might fight you!
pi_4_1_1: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Excuse me, are you alright? You're acting a bit strange.
pi_4_1_2: ~g~Suspect~w~: What? There's nothing wrong with me! I’m just minding my business!
pi_4_1_3: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: I need to ask you a few questions, just to be sure everything is alright.
pi_4_1_4: ~g~Suspect~w~: I didn’t ask to be stopped! Why are you bothering me? This is harassment!
pi_4_1_5: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: I understand, but it’s part of my job. Can I see some ID, please?
pi_4_1_6: ~o~Suspect~w~: This is bullshit! I’m not giving you anything!
pi_4_2_1: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: You seem a little nervous. Everything okay?
pi_4_2_2: ~g~Suspect~w~: Oh, uh... yeah, I guess. Just a little stressed, you know?
pi_4_2_3: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: It’s alright, I just want to make sure you’re alright. Can I see some ID?
pi_4_2_4: ~g~Suspect~w~: Yeah, no problem. I understand, officer. Here you go.
pi_4_2_5: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Thanks for understanding. Stay safe out here.
pi_4_2_6: ~g~Suspect~w~: Of course, no worries! Thanks, officer.
pi_4_3_1: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: You’re acting a bit strange. Everything alright?
pi_4_3_2: ~g~Suspect~w~: Yeah, I’m fine. Just walking around, nothing weird about it.
pi_4_3_3: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Can I see your ID, just to make sure everything’s in order?
pi_4_3_4: ~g~Suspect~w~: Sure, whatever. It’s not like it matters much.
pi_4_3_5: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: It’s just a routine check, nothing personal.
pi_4_3_6: ~g~Suspect~w~: Yeah, alright... here’s my ID. Can I go now?
pi_4_4_1: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Are you feeling okay? You seem off today.
pi_4_4_2: ~g~Suspect~w~: What’s the deal? Why are you even talking to me? I haven’t done anything wrong!
pi_4_4_3: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: I’m just trying to make sure everything’s alright. Do you have any ID?
pi_4_4_4: ~g~Suspect~w~: This is ridiculous! I’m not showing you anything! You’re wasting my time!
pi_4_4_5: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: I can call for backup if I have to, but I just need your ID, that’s all.
pi_4_4_6: ~g~Suspect~w~: Fine, whatever... you’re wasting my whole day!
pi_4_5_1: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: You seem a little off today. Everything okay?
pi_4_5_2: ~g~Suspect~w~: Oh... yeah, I’m just a bit out of it. Nothing crazy, officer. Sorry if I seem weird.
pi_4_5_3: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: No problem. Just making sure you’re alright. Got any ID on you?
pi_4_5_4: ~g~Suspect~w~: Yeah, of course... I didn’t mean to make it seem like a big deal. Here you go.
pi_4_5_5: ~b~{PlayerName}~w~: Thanks, I appreciate it. Have a good day, alright?
pi_4_5_6: ~g~Suspect~w~: You too, officer. Thanks for being cool.
dv_calladv: A Neighbour has called to report a Domestic Incident in progress, Respond ~y~CODE-2~c~ and Investigate.
dv_1_sub1: ~g~{PlayerName}: ~w~Hello Ma'am, there has been a report of Domestic Violence. Are you in any trouble?
dv_1_sub2: ~y~Lady: ~w~Hi there officer, yes that is correct. My Husband hit me and then took off.
dv_1_sub3: ~g~{PlayerName}: ~w~Ok, Do you know what he was wearing? Which way he went? and what make and color the car is?
dv_1_sub4: ~y~Lady: ~w~Im sorry, I can't remember what he was wearing. It was all a bit blurry afterwards. But he went '~o~That way~w~'.
dv_1_sub5: ~y~Lady: ~w~The car is a '~y~Sadler~w~' if that is any help
dv_1_sub6: ~g~{PlayerName}: ~w~Thank you ma'am, that is pleanty of help, Myself and some other officers will be on the lookout him.
dv_1_sub7: ~g~{PlayerName}: ~w~For the meantime, do you need any Medical Assintance?
dv_1_sub8: ~y~Lady: ~w~Yes please, that would be much appreciated
dv_1_sub9: ~g~{PlayerName}: ~w~No worries, I will call for EMS to come check you out ma'am
dv_1_sub10: NO MORE DIALOUGE. ~r~EMS ~s~HAS BEEN CALLED. PROCCED TO LOOK FOR THE ~r~SUSPECT.
dv_lastseen: ~r~SUSPECT ~w~ was last seen on ~y~'Senora Way'~n~~w~Find the ~r~SUSPECT ~w~ and arrest them.
dv_2_sub1: ~g~{PlayerName}: ~w~Hello Sir, there has been a report of Domestic Violence. Are you in any trouble?
dv_2_sub2: ~y~Man: ~w~Hi there officer, yes that is correct. My Wife hit me and then took off.
dv_2_sub3: ~g~{PlayerName}: ~w~Ok, Do you know what she was wearing? Which way she went? and what make and color the car is?
dv_2_sub4: ~y~Man: ~w~Im sorry, I can't remember what she was wearing. It was all a bit blurry afterwards. But she went '~o~That way~w~'.
dv_2_sub5: ~y~Man: ~w~The car is a '~y~Sadler~w~' if that is any help
dv_2_sub6: ~g~{PlayerName}: ~w~Thank you Sir, that is pleanty of help, Myself and some other officers will be on the lookout her.
dv_2_sub7: ~g~{PlayerName}: ~w~For the meantime, do you need any Medical Assintance?
dv_2_sub8: ~y~Man: ~w~Yes please, that would be much appreciated
dv_2_sub9: ~g~{PlayerName}: ~w~No worries, I will call for EMS to come check you out Sir
dv_2_sub10: NO MORE DIALOUGE. ~r~EMS ~s~HAS BEEN CALLED. PROCCED TO LOOK FOR THE ~r~SUSPECT.
tsbup_calladv: Officer requesting traffic stop backup. Respond ~y~CODE-2~c~.
tsbup_1_1: ~g~Cop:~s~ Hey officer, I've just pulled this person over.
tsbup_1_3: ~g~Cop:~s~ I saw this person driving quite dangerously, I decided to call for backup in case they try anything funny.
tsbup_1_4: ~b~{PlayerName}:~s~ No worries. Better safe than sorry. I'll cover you.
tsbup_1_5: ~g~Cop~s~ Actually, if you don't mind, could you go first? I'm new here and I'm still a bit nervous.
tsbup_2_1: ~g~Cop:~s~ This driver was acting really suspicious when I pulled them over.
tsbup_2_3: ~g~Cop:~s~ Kept reaching around inside the car. Possible concealed weapon or contraband.
tsbup_2_4: ~b~{PlayerName}:~s~ Got it. I'll keep my hand near my holster, just in case.
tsbup_3_1: ~g~Cop:~s~ I think this guy's been drinking. Smells like a brewery in there.
tsbup_3_3: ~g~Cop:~s~ Nope. But their speech is slurred, and they're struggling to stay balanced.
tsbup_3_4: ~b~{PlayerName}:~s~ Sounds like we need a breathalyzer test.
tsbup_3_5: ~g~Cop:~s~ Agreed. Could you handle that while I run their ID?
tsbup_4_1: ~g~Cop:~s~ This driver came back as a wanted felon. We need to be extra cautious.
tsbup_4_3: ~g~Cop:~s~ Armed robbery. Might be carrying a weapon.
tsbup_4_4: ~b~{PlayerName}:~s~ We should get them out of the vehicle carefully.
tsbup_4_5: ~g~Cop:~s~ Agreed. Let's do this by the book.
tsbup_5_1: ~g~Cop:~s~ This driver is acting really nervous. Hands are shaking.
tsbup_5_3: ~g~Cop:~s~ Nope. But they keep glancing toward the glove box.
tsbup_6_2: ~b~{PlayerName}:~s~ Did they say anything about it?
tsbup_6_3: ~g~Cop:~s~ Claimed they borrowed it, but the registered owner says otherwise.
tsbup_6_4: ~b~{PlayerName}:~s~ We should get them out and detain them.
tsbup_7_3: ~g~Cop:~s~ They claim they had no idea.
tsbup_7_4: ~b~{PlayerName}:~s~ We can't let them drive away.
tsbup_7_5: ~g~Cop:~s~ Agreed. Let's get them out and call for a tow.
tsbup_8_1: ~g~Cop:~s~ Found a firearm in the glove box, and they don’t have a permit.
tsbup_8_2: ~b~{PlayerName}:~s~ Did they say why they have it?
tsbup_8_3: ~g~Cop:~s~ Claimed it belongs to a friend.
tsbup_8_4: ~b~{PlayerName}:~s~ Sounds suspicious. We need to secure it.
tsbup_8_5: ~g~Cop:~s~ Yeah. Let’s get them out carefully.
tsbup_9_3: ~g~Cop:~s~ Claimed they forgot to renew it.
tsbup_9_5: ~g~Cop:~s~ We’ll have to tow it and issue a citation.
tsbup_10_1: ~g~Cop:~s~ This car’s registration expired months ago.
tsbup_10_2: ~b~{PlayerName}:~s~ Did they say why they haven’t renewed it?
tsbup_10_5: ~g~Cop:~s~ Yeah, they’re getting a citation at the very least.
tsbup_finished: Dialoug has finished. You are in charge of the Traffic Stop
aw_help_1_Dialogue_Finished: Dialogue has finished. Finish the call freely.
aw_sub_1_2: ~w~: Yes, that's me, officer. What's going on?
aw_sub_1_3: ~w~: We have an arrest warrant out for you.
aw_sub_1_5: ~w~: It seems to be for an unpaid fine.
aw_sub_1_6: ~w~: Oh, I wasn't aware of that. Could you show me the details?
aw_sub_1_7: ~w~: Unfortunately, I don't have all the details with me, but I can arrest you now.
aw_sub_1_8: ~w~: If you're cooperative, I can work something out later, but you still need to come with me.
aw_sub_1_10: ~w~: Yes, I am. Is there a problem?
aw_sub_1_11: ~w~: You have an outstanding arrest warrant.
aw_sub_1_12: ~w~: An arrest warrant? For what? I don't understand.
aw_sub_1_13: ~w~: The warrant is due to a charge for assault.
aw_sub_1_14: ~w~: Assault? That's ridiculous! I haven’t assaulted anyone.
aw_sub_1_15: ~w~: The court records show otherwise. You’ll need to come with me.
aw_sub_1_16: ~w~: We can discuss it further at the station, but I still need to arrest you.
aw_sub_1_18: ~w~: Yes, that's me. What's this about?
aw_sub_1_19: ~w~: There’s a warrant for your arrest related to a stolen vehicle.
aw_sub_1_20: ~w~: Stolen vehicle? I have no idea what you're talking about!
aw_sub_1_21: ~w~: The vehicle was traced back to you. We’ll need to talk about it.
aw_sub_1_22: ~w~: This is a mistake! I didn’t steal anything!
aw_sub_1_23: ~w~: I understand, but I still have to arrest you. We'll sort this out later.
aw_sub_1_24: ~w~: Be cooperative, and I’ll see what I can do to help clear this up.
aw_sub_1_26: ~w~: Yes, that’s me. What’s going on, officer?
aw_sub_1_27: ~w~: There’s a bench warrant for your arrest.
aw_sub_1_28: ~w~: A bench warrant? What did I do?
aw_sub_1_29: ~w~: It’s due to an unpaid fine for disturbing the peace.
aw_sub_1_30: ~w~: I didn’t know about this. I thought I paid everything.
aw_sub_1_31: ~w~: Unfortunately, it looks like there was a mistake in the records. However, I still need to take you in.
aw_sub_1_32: ~w~: If you cooperate, I’ll see if I can help get this sorted out.
aw_sub_1_34: ~w~: Yes, officer, I’m him. What’s the matter?
aw_sub_1_35: ~w~: There’s an arrest warrant out for you for violating a restraining order.
aw_sub_1_36: ~w~: A restraining order? But I didn’t violate it! I haven’t seen her in months!
aw_sub_1_37: ~w~: The records indicate you contacted the individual after the order was put in place.
aw_sub_1_38: ~w~: That’s impossible! I haven’t even been in town!
aw_sub_1_39: ~w~: I’m not here to argue the facts. You’ll need to come with me.
aw_sub_1_40: ~w~: You can explain everything at the station. I’ll try to clear this up.
aw_sub_1_44: ~w~: There’s a warrant for your arrest for drug trafficking.
aw_sub_1_45: ~w~: Drug trafficking? You’ve got to be kidding me!
aw_sub_1_46: ~w~: We’ve got evidence that links you to multiple cases.
aw_sub_1_47: ~w~: This is all a setup! I don’t know what you’re talking about.
aw_sub_1_48: ~w~: I’m sorry, but I have to take you in now.
aw_sub_1_49: ~w~: Once we get to the station, you can explain everything, but I still need to arrest you.
aw_sub_1_52: ~w~: Yes, officer. What seems to be the issue?
aw_sub_1_53: ~w~: There’s a warrant out for your arrest regarding public intoxication.
aw_sub_1_54: ~w~: Public intoxication? I wasn’t even drinking!
aw_sub_1_55: ~w~: According to the reports, you were seen causing a disturbance while under the influence.
aw_sub_1_56: ~w~: I wasn’t disturbing anyone! This is crazy!
aw_sub_1_57: ~w~: I need to take you in for processing. We can sort this out at the station.
aw_sub_1_58: ~w~: You can explain everything to the judge later, but for now, you’re under arrest.
aw_sub_1_61: ~w~: We’ve got a warrant out for your arrest for fraud.
aw_sub_1_62: ~w~: Fraud? I’ve never committed fraud in my life!
aw_sub_1_63: ~w~: The warrant claims you’ve been involved in a scam.
aw_sub_1_64: ~w~: That’s impossible! I’ve been working hard and doing nothing illegal.
aw_sub_1_65: ~w~: You’ll need to come with me, and we’ll sort this out in court.
aw_sub_1_66: ~w~: Be cooperative, and I’ll do my best to clear this up for you.
aw_sub_1_69: ~w~: There’s an arrest warrant for your involvement in a hit-and-run.
aw_sub_1_71: ~w~: The witnesses identified you as the driver.
aw_sub_1_72: ~w~: That’s impossible! I wasn’t even near the scene.
aw_sub_1_73: ~w~: The evidence doesn’t lie. You need to come with me.
aw_sub_1_74: ~w~: You’ll have your chance to explain yourself, but you’re under arrest for now.
aw_sub_2_2: ~w~: Yeah, what the fuck do you want, piggy?
aw_sub_2_3: ~w~: There has been an arrest warrant put out under your name.
aw_sub_2_4: ~w~: Oh well, I don't give a damn.
aw_sub_2_5: ~w~: Well, turn around and place your hands behind your back.
aw_sub_2_6: ~w~: What the fuck? Who do you think you are? I ain't going anywhere with you, piggy.
aw_sub_2_7: ~w~: You have the right to remain silent. I suggest you don't make this harder.
aw_sub_2_8: ~w~: I ain't listening to you! You're not taking me in!
aw_sub_2_9: ~w~: You can either cooperate, or we can do this the hard way.

aw_sub_2_15: ~w~: I don’t think so. You better back off now, or things will get ugly!

if_1_1: ~b~Officer~w~: Hello, we've received reports of illegal fishing here. Do you have a fishing license?
if_1_2: ~o~Fisher~w~: Oh, yeah... the license... right here... somewhere...
if_2_1: ~b~Officer~w~: You can’t fish here. This area is protected.
if_2_2: ~o~Fisher~w~: Oh, we didn’t know! We’ll leave right now, sorry, officer!
if_2_3: ~b~Officer~w~: Not so fast, I still need to check your IDs before you go.
if_3_1: ~b~Officer~w~: What kind of fish are you catching here?
if_3_2: ~o~Fisher~w~: Uh... just some small ones... nothing illegal, see?
if_3_3: ~b~Officer~w~: Let me have a look in your cooler.
if_4_1: ~b~Officer~w~: You’re fishing in a restricted area. Didn't you see the signs?
if_4_2: ~o~Fisher~w~: We thought they were just warnings... *chuckles*... but we don’t have a fishing license... what now?
if_4_3: ~b~Officer~w~: Warnings are still laws. You could be fined for this.
if_5_1: ~b~Officer~w~: Do you know fishing without a permit is illegal?
if_5_2: ~o~Fisher~w~: I was just tryin' to get food for my family
if_5_3: ~b~Officer~w~: I understand, but the law still applies here.
if_5_4: ~o~Fisher~w~: Don’t care anymore... I’m outta here!
if_6_1: ~b~Officer~w~: Do you understand the environmental impact of fishing here?
if_6_2: ~o~Fisher~w~: We’re just catchin' a few fish... not hurting the ocean.
if_6_3: ~b~Officer~w~: Even small actions can have a big impact on the ecosystem.
if_7_1: ~b~Officer~w~: Can you show me what you’ve caught so far?
if_7_2: ~o~Fisher~w~: Sure... just some bass, trout nothing illegal.
if_7_3: ~b~Officer~w~: These are under the legal size limit.
if_8_1: ~b~Officer~w~: We got a report of illegal fishing. Can you explain?
if_8_2: ~o~Fisher~w~: Someone must've called for no reason... we ain't doin' nothin' wrong!
if_8_3: ~b~Officer~w~: Let me verify that. Stay right here.
fwa_call_msg: Reports of a Wild Animal Encounter
fwa_1_2: ~g~Hiker 1:~w~ We're okay! Just... watch out for that animal! (2/7)
fwa_1_3: ~g~Hiker 2:~w~ It’s been following us for a while. Be careful! (3/7)
fwa_1_5: ~g~Hiker 1:~w~ It’s been aggressive. We tried to scare it off, but it’s getting closer. (5/7)
fwa_1_6: ~g~Hiker 2:~w~ We need help. Can you do something? (6/7)
fwa_1_7: ~y~{PlayerName}:~w~ I'll take care of it. Stay calm. (7/7)
fwa_2_2: g~Hiker 1:~w~ That animal attacked us out of nowhere! (1/7)
fwa_2_3: ~g~Hiker 2:~w~ We tried running, but it’s too fast! (3/7)
fwa_2_4: ~y~{PlayerName}:~w~ You guys need to stay back, I'll handle this. (4/7)
fwa_2_5: ~g~Hiker 1:~w~ Please hurry! It's right behind us! (5/7)
fwa_2_6: ~g~Hiker 2:~w~ Can you shoot it or scare it off somehow? (6/7
fwa_2_7: ~y~{PlayerName}:~w~ Don't worry. I’ve got it under control. (7/7)
fwa_3_2: ~g~Hiker 1:~w~ We came across this animal... it's been circling us for a while. (2/7)
fwa_3_3: ~g~Hiker 2:~w~ It looks like it might attack. We should move! (3/7)
fwa_3_4: ~y~{PlayerName}:~w~ Stay calm. I’ll try to get it away from you. (4/7)
fwa_3_5: ~g~Hiker 1:~w~ It’s not listening to us! Help! (5/7)
fwa_3_6: ~g~Hiker 2:~w~ We need to get out of here, officer! (6/7)
fwa_3_7: ~y~{PlayerName}:~w~ I'm calling animal control. Hang tight. (7/7)
fwa_4_2: ~g~Hiker 1:~w~ This animal just attacked us, and we’re stuck! (2/7)
fwa_4_3: ~g~Hiker 2:~w~ It’s getting aggressive, we need help! (3/5)
fwa_4_4: ~y~{PlayerName}:~w~ Stay calm. I’m going to scare it off. (4/7)
fwa_4_6: ~g~Hiker 2:~w~ Please do something! It won’t leave us alone! (6/7)
fwa_4_7: ~y~{PlayerName}:~w~ I’ll handle it. Just stay back. (7/7)
fwa_5_2: ~g~Hiker 1:~w~ No, that animal attacked us, and we’re stuck! (2/7)
fwa_5_3: ~g~Hiker 2:~w~ It’s getting aggressive, we need help! (3/7)
fwa_5_4: ~y~{PlayerName}:~w~ Stay calm. I’m going to scare it off. (4/7)
fwa_5_6: ~g~Hiker 2:~w~ Please hurry, it might attack again! (6/7)
ps_calladv: There have been reports of possible Solicitation in the area. Respond CODE-2 to find Hooker.
ps_1_1: ~r~Hooker:~w~ Okaayyy.... What seems to be the problem, uhm officer?
ps_1_2: ~b~Player:~w~ We have had reports of possible Prostitution at this location. Are you selling your body for money?
ps_1_3: ~r~Hooker:~w~ What? No way, officer! I’m just waiting for my friend to pick me up.
ps_1_4: ~b~Player:~w~ Dressed like that? At this hour? It seems a bit suspicious.
ps_1_5: ~r~Hooker:~w~ I like to dress how I want. Since when was that illegal?
ps_2_1: ~r~Hooker:~w~ Oh, um... hi officer, what’s up?
ps_2_2: ~b~Player:~w~ We have had reports of possible Prostitution at this location. Are you selling your body for money?
ps_2_3: ~r~Hooker:~w~ What? Who told you that? I ain't doing nothing wrong
ps_2_4: ~b~Player:~w~ Then why do you keep looking around like you're expecting someone?
ps_2_5: ~r~Hooker:~w~ I'm just waiting for my Uber, okay? Jeez.
ps_3_1: ~r~Hooker:~w~ Well, well, well... If it isn’t the fun police.
ps_3_2: ~b~Player:~w~ We have had reports of possible Prostitution at this location. Are you selling
ps_4_1: ~r~Hooker:~w~ Ooooh, a man in uniform. I love a guy with authority.
ps_4_2: ~b~Player:~w~ We have had reports of possible Prostitution at this location. Are you selling your body for money?
ps_4_4: ~b~Player:~w~ That’s not how this works. Answer the question.
ps_4_5: ~r~Hooker:~w~ Relax, officer. I’m just teasing! No business going on here.
ps_5_1: ~r~Hooker:~w~ Ugh, what now?! Can’t a girl just stand around?
ps_5_2: ~b~Player:~w~ We have had reports of possible Prostitution at this location. Are you selling your body for money?
ps_5_3: ~r~Hooker:~w~ Oh, so I can’t even exist without being accused of something?
ps_5_4: ~b~Player:~w~ I need to confirm what’s going on here. Just answer the question.
ps_5_5: ~r~Hooker:~w~ I’m not answering anything! This is harassment!
ps_6_1: ~r~Hooker:~w~ Hey there, officer! How can I help?
ps_6_2: ~b~Player:~w~ We have had reports of possible Prostitution at this location. Are you selling your body for money?
ps_6_3: ~r~Hooker:~w~ Uh… maybe? I mean, I was just talking to a guy about that… wait! No, I mean… I was just chatting!
ps_6_5: ~r~Hooker:~w~ No! I—I mean… uh… can I go now?
ps_7_1: ~r~Hooker:~w~ Officer! What seems to be the issue?
ps_7_2: ~b~Player:~w~ We have had reports of possible Prostitution at this location. Are you selling your body for money?
ps_7_3: ~r~Hooker:~w~ No way! I was just talking to my boyfriend.
ps_7_5: ~r~Hooker:~w~ Uh… it’s… Mike! Yeah, Mike! He just left, though.
ps_8_1: ~r~Hooker:~w~ Oh hey, officer. What’s going on?
ps_8_2: ~b~Player:~w~ We have had reports of possible Prostitution at this location. Are you selling your body for money?
ps_8_4: ~b~Player:~w~ Don’t play dumb with me. Are you engaging in illegal activity?
ps_8_5: ~r~Hooker:~w~ Oh no, officer! I would never do such a thing… Whatever it is.
ps_9_2: ~b~Player:~w~ We have had reports of possible Prostitution at this location. Are you selling your body for money?
ps_9_3: ~r~Hooker:~w~ Oh, please. I just come here to talk to people. I know everyone on this street.
ps_9_4: ~b~Player:~w~ Funny, because we keep seeing different cars stopping by.
ps_9_5: ~r~Hooker:~w~ What can I say? I’m a social butterfly!
ps_10_1: ~r~Hooker:~w~ Officer! I swear, I ain’t doing that no more.
ps_10_2: ~b~Player:~w~ We have had reports of possible Prostitution at this location. Are you selling your body for money?
ps_10_3: ~r~Hooker:~w~ No way! I left that life behind! I’m clean now.
ps_10_4: ~b~Player:~w~ Then why are you still hanging around this area?
ps_10_5: ~r~Hooker:~w~ Just catching up with old friends, that’s all.
